name: Chef John Smith
title: Head Chef
description: Lee Chang is the head chef at Golden Dragon Restaurant. He has over 20 years of experience in Chinese cuisine.

recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes.method: 1. Cut chicken into small cubes and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch. 2. Stir-fry chicken, dried chili peppers, and peanuts in a wok until chicken is cooked. 3. Add sugar, vinegar, and sesame oil. 4. Garnish with chopped green onions.

recipes.name: Egg Drop Soup
recipes.method: 1. Heat chicken broth in a pot. 2. Beat eggs and cornstarch together. 3. Slowly pour egg mixture into the hot broth while stirring. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Garnish with chopped green onions.

recipes.name: Steamed Pork Buns
recipes.method: 1. Mix flour, yeast, and sugar to make dough. 2. Make filling with ground pork, soy sauce, chopped green onions, and sesame oil. 3. Roll out dough and wrap around the filling. 4. Steam buns in a bamboo steamer for 10-12 minutes.

name: Chef Jane Lee
title: Dim Sum Chef
description: Jin Li is a dim sum chef at Dynasty Seafood Restaurant. He has been making dim sum for over 30 years.

recipes.name: Shrimp Dumplings
recipes.method: 1. Mix flour and cornstarch to make dough. 2. Make filling with chopped shrimp, bamboo shoots, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar, and white pepper. 3. Roll out dough and wrap around the filling. 4. Steam dumplings for 8-10 minutes.

recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
